arabic_text: إِلَٰهُكُمۡ إِلَٰهٞ وَٰحِدٞۚ فَٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ قُلُوبُهُم مُّنكِرَةٞ وَهُم مُّسۡتَكۡبِرُونَ
translation: Your God is One God. But those who do not believe in the Hereafter, their hearts refuse to know, and they are arrogant[13].
footnotes: [13] Arrogance and snobbery are the underlying reasons for denying Allah’s Signs and rejecting the Truth.
